import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import assignColour from '../../utils/assignColour' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' const BannerView = ({ city, country, popularity }) => { return

{city}, {country}

#{popularity} most popular destination in the world

} BannerView.propTypes = { city: PropTypes.string.isRequired, country: PropTypes.string.isRequired, popularity: PropTypes.number.isRequired } export default BannerView
